name: OCKAdherenceAggregator
desc: Methods that compute an adherence value, given an array of events.

items.name: case outcomeExists
items.desc: A case that returns an average completion value, based on whether an outcome for each event exists.

items.name: case percentOfOutcomeValuesThatExist
items.desc: A case that returns an average completion value, based on the percentage for each event, divided by the number of outcomes values.

items.name: case compareTargetValues
items.desc: A case that returns an average completion value, based on whether or not all target values have been met.

items.name: case percentOfTargetValuesMet
items.desc: A case that returns an average completion value, based on how many target values have been met.

items.name: case custom(([OCKAnyEvent]) -> OCKAdherence)
items.desc: A case that returns an average completion value, based on a closure you provide.

items.name: func aggregate(events: [OCKAnyEvent]) -> OCKAdherence
items.desc: Aggregates an array of events into an adherence score.
